name: Project C.A.B.L.E
description:
Project C.A.B.L.E is  a top-down survival game based in a testing facility and you play as a recently created technology that could revolutionise the world. Survive an onslaught of enemies enemies with the help of various power ups to earn score, whilst attending to other objectives.

HOW TO INSTALL:
-Extract the download using 7zip
-Open the .exe
-Enjoy
